channel.title: Batch Scripts on Dhiman Roy

item.title: Batch script for adding firewall rules
item.description: Batch script for adding firewall rules @echo off REM BATCH FILE CREATED BY CHARLES DE HAVILLAND 10/09/2015 cls net session >nul 2>&1 if %errorLevel% == 0 ( echo. ) else ( GOTO :NOPERM ) SETLOCAL EnableDelayedExpansion for /F "tokens=1,2 delims=#" %%a in ('"prompt #$H#$E# & echo on & for %%b in (1) do rem"') do ( set "DEL=%%a" ) @cd /d "%~dp0" for %%* in (.) do set RULENAME=%%~nx* ECHO|set /p ="- Add " call :ColorText 0a "Block In & Out " ECHO Firewall rules for all *.
